mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( title, content, user_idx, file_idx ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{userIdx}, #{fileIdx} )
mapper.select: SELECT b.idx, # 게시글번호 b.title, # 게시글제목 b.content, # 게시글내용 b.name, # 작성자 b.save_date, # 작성일자 b.modify_date, # 수정일자 b.file_idx # 첨부파일번호 FROM board b ORDER BY b.save_date DESC
SELECT b.idx, b.title, b.content, b.name, b.save_date, b.modify_date, b.file_idx, f.save_path, f.ori_file_name FROM board b, file f WHERE b.idx = #{idx} AND b.file_idx = f.idx
SELECT b.idx, b.title, b.content, b.name, b.save_date, b.modify_date FROM board b WHERE b.title LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{title},'%') ORDER BY b.save_date DESC
SELECT b.idx, b.title, b.content, b.name, b.save_date, b.modify_date FROM board b WHERE b.name LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{name}, '%') ORDER BY b.save_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, modify_date = current_timestamp() WHERE 1=1 AND b.idx = #{idx}
